nodes.text: PW-15 XT Plasma Core Sniper Rifle
The PW-15 XT Plasma Core Sniper Rifle was a model of sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The PW-15 XT Plasma Core Sniper Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Mid Rim Explorer Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on June 9, 2015.
